test_cases.input: <form name="loginform" action="./enter.cfm" method="POST" onSubmit="cfadminPassword.value = hex_hmac_sha1(salt.value, hex_sha1(cfadminPassword.value));" >

all_versions.pattern: <form\ name="loginform"\ action="\./enter\.cfm"\ method="POST"\ onSubmit="cfadminPassword\.value\ =\ hex_hmac_sha1\(salt\.value,\ hex_sha1\(cfadminPassword\.value\)\);"\ >
